xwikidoc.content:
rightsmanager.rightsCol=Right to
rightuisimplifier.goto.basic=Go to basic view rightuisimplifier.goto.advanced=Go to advanced view
rightuisimplifier.save.inprogress=Saving rights for __name__ rightuisimplifier.save.done=Rights for __name__ saved rightuisimplifier.save.failed=Failed to save rights for __name__
# Label when there is no right or custom right assigned to the user rightuisimplifier.levels.label_noright=No right rightuisimplifier.levels.label_adv=Custom rights (see advanced view)
# These are the label for the selections in the listbox rightuisimplifier.levels.label_1=View rightuisimplifier.levels.label_2=View and comment rightuisimplifier.levels.label_3=View, comment and edit rightuisimplifier.levels.label_4=View, comment, edit and delete
# These are not translations but actual rights being set, matching the above labels rightuisimplifier.levels.level_1=view rightuisimplifier.levels.level_2=view,comment rightuisimplifier.levels.level_3=view,edit,comment rightuisimplifier.levels.level_4=view,edit,comment,delete
rightuisimplifier.filter.groupsIBelongTo=Groups I belong to rightuisimplifier.filter.groupsWithRights=Groups with rights rightuisimplifier.filter.allGroups=All groups
rightuisimplifier.filter.applicationname=Filters for the Right UI Simplifier
